org.jgrapes.io

Class NioDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.ComponentVertex
      • org.jgrapes.core.Component
        • org.jgrapes.io.NioDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<AttachedComponent>, java.lang.Runnable, AttachedComponent, Channel, Matchable, Manager

    public class NioDispatcher
extends Component
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A helper component that provides the central hub for non blocking I/O components. Exactly one NioDispatcher must exist in any tree with NioHandler components.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

      • onStart

        @Handler
public void onStart(Start event)

        Invoked once by the thread associated with the dispatcher. Handles all events from the underlying Selector.
